Mike:

The one selling these cards is Anthony (aka lug-nut).  Anthony made the original post on Feb 3.  However, on Feb 9 Leon modified Anthony's post to correct the line spacing.  At that point, Leon's name ended up in the username of the original post.  The change in the username is one of the strange things that has been happening with threads on net54 lately.
